page.title: 15Health in Dungiven
page.content: A new {Health Centre}opened in July 1985 in the Castle grounds.Here {Doctors Maraswamy,Johnstone and Byrne} hold daily clinics. There is a baby clinic where vaccinations,weighing babies and problems concerning babies are dealt with.A speech therapist attends each Monday and Wednesday.A clinic for minor emergencies,dressings etc.is also available.There is some disappointment that there are no dental or chiropody clinics.Old people and babies are visited in their homes by a Health Visitor or a District Nurse.Serious emergencies are referred to {Altnagelvin Hospital}twenty miles away.Less urgent patients and the elderly are catered for in Limavady's{ {Roe Valley Hospital}nine miles away. Meals on Wheels are delivered by voluntary workers to eldery and infirm people in the district.
